title: QA regression — full test suite verification after bug fixes
description: After developer fixes test failures (TASK-036) and audit vulns (TASK-037), run full regression: (1) npm test — all tests pass, (2) npm run build — clean compile, (3) npm run lint — no errors, (4) Smoke test all CLI commands: --version, --help, config show, config show --json, history, completions bash/zsh/fish. Report results.
acceptance_criteria: All tests pass. Build clean. Lint clean. All CLI commands produce expected output.

comments.text: Dev fixes landed, ready for full regression
